sentences.en: "Have you finished with me?" Luke asked, when he had listened to Armstrong's report of his evidence.
sentences.cn: “你已经都问完我了吗？”卢克听完阿姆斯特朗向自己重述的证词后问道。

sentences.en: "One small step for man, " Neil Armstrong said.
sentences.cn: “个人一小步”，尼尔.阿姆斯特朗说道。

sentences.en: Aldrin soon followed Armstrong down the ladder to become the second man to stand on the moon.
sentences.cn: 奥尔德林不久跟随阿姆斯特朗走下舷梯，成为在月球上登陆的第二个人。

sentences.en: Armstrong drove the ball into the roof of the net.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗将球打入球门网顶。

sentences.en: Armstrong is uncertain where his long-term future lies.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗拿不准自己的人生远景在何方。

sentences.en: Armstrong looked round at his classmates, silly glee in profile.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗四下里打量着同学们, 露出傻笑的侧影.

sentences.en: Armstrong was boxed in with 300 metres to go.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗在离目的地还有300米的地方被堵住不能动弹。

sentences.en: Armstrong was tall and handsome to the last.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗从来都是这么高大、英俊。

sentences.en: But underpinning Mr Armstrong's technology changes is a human touch.
sentences.cn: 但阿姆斯特朗技术变革的支柱是人情味.

sentences.en: Fans watch Lance Armstrong race the prologue trial July 3 in Rotterdam.
sentences.cn: 球迷观看比赛的序幕兰斯阿姆斯特朗计时赛7月3日在鹿特丹.

sentences.en: It had been widely and erroneously reported that Armstrong had refused to give evidence.
sentences.cn: 大量失实的报道称阿姆斯特朗拒绝提供证据。

sentences.en: It was in Chicago that Louis Armstrong became famous.
sentences.cn: 阿姆斯特朗就是在芝加哥出名的.

sentences.en: Its mechanism still conforms to the Armstrong theory.
Jones and Armstrong maintain a consistently high standard.
sentences.cn: 琼斯和阿姆斯特朗始终保持着高水准。

sentences.en: Louis Armstrong defined jazz pithily as "what I play for a living".
sentences.cn: 路易斯·阿姆斯特朗把爵士乐简明扼要地定义为“我一门糊口的手艺”。

sentences.en: Perhaps I like Louis Armstrong because he's made poetry out of being invisible.
sentences.cn: 路易斯·阿姆斯特朗善于把无形无体的境界诗一般地表现出来,也许这是我喜欢他的原因.

sentences.en: This was the moment when Neil Armstrong became the first man to step on the Moon.
sentences.cn: 就在此刻，内尔·阿姆斯特朗成了首位登上月球的人。

phrases.tran_cn: 路易斯·阿姆斯特朗（爵士乐家）
尼尔·阿姆斯特朗（第一个离开地球踏上月球的人）

trans.tran_cn: 阿姆斯壮（美国宇航员，1969年7月登陆月球，成为第一个登上月球的地球人）
